descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Welcome to FastHands, your ultimate parkour playground. Run, climb and glide through quantum courses - solo or with friends (6 player). Climb the leaderboards and uncover strange anomalies that hint at a deeper secret the company doesn’t want you to find.

Optionally play with hand tracking for maximum immersion.

# Must-Do Experiences on Your Visit
- Run, jump, wall-run, dive and glide through the air
- Climb with ease using spider fingers
- Hit boosts to feel the speed
- Shoot targets (or friends) with your slingshot 
- Beat the courses, then randomly generate your own
- Try the mini-games and special multiplayer modes
- Explore the anomalies to uncover Abraham's story

# More About FastHands
Ganymede, Jupiter’s most boring moon. We blew it up, harvested and entangled all its lovely Quantumite and replaced it with the FastHands playground. Hurrah!

We won't bore you with the technical babble about quantum mechanics and superposition state. Just know: courses form as you progress, everything can change at any moment and your reality might not match your friends'.

**We blew up a moon for this. Don’t waste it.**

# Feedback
Chat in our discord channel or contact us details:
www.x82hub.com/fasthands
